name: ART of WISPS
description:
You were hired to investigate a haunted painting. Use your tools to expel the evil and keep yourself stable.

LISTEN closely to the sound that indicate the incoming of the evil.

Using HEADPHONES is RECOMMENDED.

CONTROL:

  • MOUSE CLICK to USE POLAROID and PHONE
  • CLICK BUTTON to PERFORM ACTIONS
  • PRESS [E] to PUT DOWN OBJECT
  • PRESS [R] to RELIEVE EXHAUSTION

---------------------------------------------------------

Note*

Sound Effects: FreeSound.org

Reminders:

Assets except the sound effects are created by ROK1006.

Developed by ROK1006.

FOLLOW Instagram Account @r_ok_ot for more of my other works and currently developing games.

This is my very first attempt to develop a horror game.

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING.
